Title: Bitter Rice
Writer: Giuseppe De Santis (story), Carlo Lizzani (story), Gianni Puccini (story), Corrado Alvaro (screenplay), Giuseppe De Santis (screenplay), Carlo Lizzani (screenplay), Carlo Musso (screenplay), Ivo Perilli (screenplay), Gianni Puccini (screenplay)
Actors: Vittorio Gassman, Doris Dowling, Silvana Mangano, Raf Vallone
Plot: Francesca and Walter are two-bit criminals in Northern Italy, and, in an effort to avoid the police, Francesca joins a group of women rice workers. She meets the voluptuous peasant rice worker, Silvana, and the soon-to-be-discharged soldier, Marco. Walter follows her to the rice fields, and the four characters become involved in a complex plot involving robbery, love, and murder.
